snippet.title: GARFIELD KART - TRAILER - IOS ANDROID PC MAC - MICROIDS GAMES FOR ALL
snippet.description:
Join us on Facebook (http://on.fb.me/microigfa ) and on Twitter(http://bit.ly/microidgfa)

Retrouvez la version française : http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x16ydvs

Join Garfield and his friends in the funniest fast and fur-ious game!

What character do you want to play with? Garfield, Odie, Jon, Nermal... you choose! Take part in no-holds-barred crazy races in either multiplayer mode or against the computer!

Challenge your friends whatever platform they're on (mobile, tablet, PC, Mac, etc...) thanks to the CROSSPLATFORM multiplayer mode!

Your time to play on :
iOs : http://itunes.apple.com/app/id656101044
Android : http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microids.google.garfieldkart



Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/microids.gamesforall
Twitter : http://twitter.com/microids_forall
